reviews.Comment:

Coming to the smartphone itself, the device is a perfect all-rounder with a beautiful display and exceptional set of cameras. Snapdragon 8 gen 1 chipset with well optimized OneUI, gives the smoothest user experience. The battery life is healthy, with the phone lasting a day and a half with moderate use, and easily a day with heavy use. Go with it eye closed.
Cheers,
AshK
